titles.title: TEST AI Act of 2024
TEST AI Act of 2023
Testing and Evaluation Systems for Trusted Artificial Intelligence Act of 2023
TEST AI Act of 2024
Testing and Evaluation Systems for Trusted Artificial Intelligence Act of 2024

A bill to improve the requirement for the Director of the National Institute of Standards and Technology to establish testbeds to support the development and testing of trustworthy artificial intelligence systems and to improve interagency coordination in development of such testbeds, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Reported by Senator Cantwell with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 722.

committee.name: Senate Commerce, Science, and Transportation
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
